title: Champ select ban bug?
body:
Ok, so.

I just waited 15~ minutes in a queue for Ranked, only to get my second pref role, ok NP, it happens, I lock in my ban for the game, nothing happens, I click it again, nothing happens, I spam click on Yasuo, counter timing down, then I get kicked from the matchmaking, followed by this error message: "Error selectChampionBanV1. We didn't hear back from the server. Give it another shot."

Ok, i'll give it another shot, AFTER MY DODGE PENALTY expires -.-
But really, I guess the 5 minutes isn't a big deal, but I heard dodging in placement matches drastically effects your MMR? Is this true?

Regards,
Kurizu

(Screenshot here: http://imgur.com/BZk0gpH)
